programme.title: The Great Texas Dynamite Chase
programme.desc: Two women (Claudia Jennings, Jocelyn Jones) rob banks with dynamite and take a hostage (Johnny Crawford) who becomes one's lover.

programme.title: Cleopatra Jones
programme.desc: Federal agent Jones (Tamara Dobson) tries to rescue her framed boyfriend (Bernie Casey) from a drug-queen pervert known as Mommy (Shelley Winters).

programme.title: Cleopatra Jones and the Casino of Gold
programme.desc: Federal agent Jones (Tamara Dobson), trained in martial arts, routs a drug-dealing dragon lady (Stella Stevens) from her Macao gambling den.

programme.title: Slaughter in San Francisco
programme.desc: A former policeman (Don Wong) avenges his partner, killed by a gang whose leader (Chuck Norris) he fights.

programme.title: Black Samson
programme.desc: A nightclub owner (Rockne Tarkington) with a pet lion rids his neighborhood of a white mobster (William Smith).

programme.title: Black Brigade
programme.desc: A group of soldiers with no combat experience hold a World War II dam for their bigoted captain (Stephen Boyd).

programme.title: The Twilight People
programme.desc: A kidnapped diver is taken to an island where a mad scientist lives with his half-animal, half-human creations.

programme.title: Soul!
programme.desc: Female singing trio LaBelle; conga drum/bongo musician Mongo Santamaria.

programme.title: Soul!
programme.desc: Exuma; Taj Mahal; actress Cicely Tyson, star of the motion picture, "Sounder."

programme.title: Soul!
programme.desc: Guests include Tony Award-winning singer Linda Hopkins and the musical group Earth, Wind & Fire.

programme.title: Soul!
programme.desc: The Spinners; The Jimmy Castor Bunch.

programme.title: To All My Friends on Shore
programme.desc: A working-class man (Bill Cosby) works hard for his family, then learns his son has sickle cell anemia.

programme.title: The Black Six
programme.desc: Righteous biker Bubba (Gene Washington) and his five war buddies go south to avenge his slain brother.

programme.title: Firehouse
programme.desc: A rookie (Richard Roundtree) and a white bigot (Vince Edwards) clash in a city fire department faced with arson.

programme.title: Cool Breeze
programme.desc: A paroled crook (Thalmus Rasulala) masterminds a $3 million jewelry theft to fund a bank for businessmen.

programme.title: The Jackie Robinson Story
programme.desc: After a successful baseball career in college and as a coach in the military, Jackie Robinson attracts the attention of Major League Baseball's Branch Rickey.

programme.title: One Down, Two to Go
programme.desc: Buddies Cal (Fred Williamson), J. (Jim Brown), Chuck (Jim Kelly) and Ralph even the score for a rip-off martial-arts tournament.
